item.title: Why You Should Learn Linux
item.description: Why You Should Probably Learn Linux Let’s face it, Linux sounds scary to the untrained ear. Most average users think of black and white terminals, and pale, white, basement dwellers clacking assembly and basic into an ancient IBM machine when they hear the term “ Linux” arise in conversation. Of course, the same might not be said for Data Scientists, and programmers alike, but the stigma is certainly still illustrated inside of that particular clique.

item.title: Linux Survival Guide
item.description: Linux: A Survival Guide for Beginners I survived the transition to Linux—and you can too Photo by Chris Ried on Unsplash Switching from Windows to Linux can be really scary. But if you can survive the first few months, the eventual returns are exponential. Here’s how I survived. TLDR Though I am just an amateur in Linux, I was able to survive the transition and indeed benefitted from it.
